Articles.Content:
Well as you can tell my (user)name is Leax, it is anogram of Axel, the character form Kingdom Hearts, the 256 comes from is rank in the orginization 8*2^2. I've played ksp back when it was free and no one knew what it was, I thought it was some kind of rocket simulater by nasa or some other space orginization, however I was only able to get the funds to buy the game till just a few weeks ago. Good timing too considering the DLC/Expansions debate that was going on I had no idea was happening. I enjoy playing and actually do livestreams weekly. I am also really bad at making spaceplanes and have only succeded at doing so with this

So that's all I can think of.
